name: spinalcore
description: Fog middleware that enables data virtualization and interoperability for the Internet of Things

scripts.build-for-node: $(npm bin)/coffee --join lib/spinalcore.node.js -bc src/index.coffee src/model-process-manager.coffee src/models/model.coffee src/models/model.obj.coffee src/models/model.choice.coffee src/models/model.bool.coffee src/models/model.constrained-val.coffee src/models/model.lst.coffee src/models/model.val.coffee src/models/model.str.coffee src/file-system/* src/processes/p* src/processes/b*
scripts.build-for-browser: npm run build-for-node && browserify extras/browser.js --outfile lib/spinalcore.browser.js

author: SpinalCom
